concept.title: Idle Timeout parameter
concept.shortdesc: By default, BIG-IP will send a reset on timeout signal (RST) to any connection which has been silent for 300 seconds. BIG-IP ignores TCP keepalive probes. You should increase the RST connection value to avoid terminating connections earlier than needed.

section.p: The Idle Timeout setting can be configured from Local Traffic Profiles Protocol TCP tcp-wan-optimized . Sending an MQTT PING request on a connection is sufficient to prevent an Idle Timeout on that connection.
